# MTLLibrary

**Protocol**

A collection of Metal shader functions.

## Declaration

```swift
protocol MTLLibrary : NSObjectProtocol, Sendable
```

## Overview

An [doc://com.apple.metal/documentation/Metal/MTLLibrary] instance contains Metal shading language source code compiled during an app’s build process or at runtime from a text string.

Don’t implement this protocol yourself; instead, use the library creation methods provided by the [doc://com.apple.metal/documentation/Metal/MTLDevice] protocol. To create an [doc://com.apple.metal/documentation/Metal/MTLLibrary] from a precompiled Metal library binary, call one of these [doc://com.apple.metal/documentation/Metal/MTLDevice] methods:

- [doc://com.apple.metal/documentation/Metal/MTLDevice/makeDefaultLibrary()]
- [doc://com.apple.metal/documentation/Metal/MTLDevice/makeLibrary(filepath:)]
- [doc://com.apple.metal/documentation/Metal/MTLDevice/makeLibrary(data:)]

To create an [doc://com.apple.metal/documentation/Metal/MTLLibrary] by compiling source code at runtime, call one of these [doc://com.apple.metal/documentation/Metal/MTLDevice] methods:

- [doc://com.apple.metal/documentation/Metal/MTLDevice/makeLibrary(source:options:completionHandler:)]
- [doc://com.apple.metal/documentation/Metal/MTLDevice/makeLibrary(source:options:)]

## Querying basic library attributes

- **installName**: The installation name for a dynamic library.
- **type**: The library’s basic type.

## Querying library contents

- **functionNames**: The names of all public functions in the library.

## Creating shader function instances

- **makeFunction(name:)**: Creates an instance that represents a shader function in the library.
- **makeFunction(name:constantValues:completionHandler:)**: Asynchronously creates a specialized shader function.
- **makeFunction(name:constantValues:)**: Synchronously creates a specialized shader function.
- **makeFunction(descriptor:completionHandler:)**: Asynchronously creates an object representing a shader function, using the specified descriptor.
- **makeFunction(descriptor:)**: Synchronously creates an object representing a shader function, using the specified descriptor.

## Creating intersection function instances

- **makeIntersectionFunction(descriptor:completionHandler:)**: Asynchronously creates an object representing a ray-tracing intersection function, using the specified descriptor.
- **makeIntersectionFunction(descriptor:)**: Synchronously creates an object representing a ray-tracing intersection function, using the specified descriptor.

## Identifying the library

- **device**: The Metal device object that created the library.
- **label**: A string that identifies the library.

## Instance Methods

- **reflection(functionName:)**: Retrieves reflection information for a function in the library.

## Shader library management

- **MTLDynamicLibrary**: A dynamically linkable representation of compiled shader code for a specific Metal device object.
- **MTLBinaryArchive**: A container for pipeline state descriptors and their associated compiled shader code.
- **MTLCompileOptions**: Compilation settings for a Metal shader library.
- **MTLLibraryType**: A set of options for Metal library types.
- **MTLLanguageVersion**: Metal shading language versions.
- **MTLCompileSymbolVisibility**
- **MTLLibraryOptimizationLevel**: The optimization options for the Metal compiler.

## Inherits From

- NSObjectProtocol
- Sendable
- SendableMetatype
